info.title: CPS Interface Description
info.description:
The interfaces of the Certificate Provisioning Service (CPS) are used to request the provisioning of Contract Data. The [Contract Certificate Pool (CCP)](docs/components/contract-certificate-pool.md) only accepts Contract Data signed by a trusted CPS. Optionally the data can be forwarded to the CCP directly by the CPS. 

This service provides the following interfaces:
 * Sign Contract Data by CPS
 * Generate Signed Contract Data
 * Create Signed Contract Data - deprecated
 * Create and Forward Signed Contract Data - deprecated

### Clients

The CPS communicates with the following actors and services:

 * The _Mobility Operator_ calls the CPS API actively to send/create Contract Data.
 * The _Contract Certificate Pool_ receives Signed Contract Data forwarded by the CPS.
 * OCSP Responders of the Contract Certificates
 * Root Certificate Pool

put.description:
This interface signs [Contract Data](cps.v1.json/components/schemas/ContractData) in the CPS and sends it as [Signed Contract Data](models/signed-contract-data.v1.json) back to the MO. By using the Parameter _PCID_ the Signed Contract Data are getting stored in the Contract Certificate Pool, and it is made available for the OEM and CPO backend.


> #### How to store Signed Data in CCP
> If the parameter _PCID_ is set and valid, the signed contractdata will be stored in the CCP as well. If the paramter is not set, the signed object will not be stored in the CCP.

> #### This combines to deprecated calls
> This function bundles to deprecated functions: 
> - /v1/cps/contractData/signed 
> - /v1/cps/forward/signedContractData

put.summary: Create and forward Signed Contract Data

errorMessages: Invalid certificate format on contractSignatureCertChainSubCertificates list
Invalid Tupple - EMAID is already used by other PCID.

put.description:
This interface signs [Contract Data](cps.v1.json/components/schemas/ContractData) in the CPS and stores them in the CCP. 

<!-- theme: warning -->
> #### Deprecated!
> Please be aware that this method is deprecated. Please use /v1/cps/contractData/signed

This interface signs [Contract Data](cps.v1.json/components/schemas/contract-data) in the CPS and sends it as [Signed Contract Data](cps.v1.json/components/schemas/CreateSignedContractDataResponse) back to the MO. By using this method Signed Contract Data is not stored in the Contract Certificate Pool, and it is not made available for the OEM and CPO backend. After using this method, the _Add Signed Contract Data_ method of the Contract Certificate Pool could be used to store the Signed Contract Data in CCP or its getting stored in another CCP

<!-- theme: warning -->
> #### Deprecated!
> Please be aware that this method is deprecated. Please use /v1/cps/contractData/signed

errorMessages: Invalid Tupple - EMAID is already used by other PCID.
The given contractEnds date is in the past.
The OEM provisioning certificate with the given PCID is not available.

put.description:
This service creates and signs contractData for delivered contract information. The contract certificate will be signed by the MO SUB CA2 which is derived from the V2G Root CA

The created and signed contractData is stored in the contract certificate pool for provisioning to the OEM- and CPO-backend. 

To update a contractData, the interface must be called again with the same PCID and EMAID. The system will replace the old contractData with the new one.

cpsCertificates.cpsRootDistinguishedName: CN=V2G Root CA QA G1, DC=V2G, O=Hubject GmbH, C=DE

get.description: For using getAllCpsSigners interface, no input is necessary. The Interface returns a list of all available CPS signer certificates available of the CPS operator. This method can be used by MOs to detect and define with which CPS signer the contract shall be signed

MO_without_PKI.description: OAuth2 is used to grant access to the endpoint. In the case of "MO without PKI" role, the MO is using Hubject V2G PKI to sign certificates.

MO_with_own_PKI.description: OAuth2 is used to grant access to the endpoint.

contractSignatureCertChainCertificate.description: Contract Certificate in base64 encoded DER form

contractSignatureCertChainSubCertificate.description: Contract Certificate SUB CAs in base64 encoded DER form, array starting with SUB MO CA2 followed by MO SUB CA1

dHpublickey.description: DH Public Key as defined in the ISO15118

emaid.description: contract identifier of contract certificate. Needs to fit to the common name in the contract certificate

metaData.description: could be used for further application/information exchange

pcid.description: PCID of the Provisioning certificate which need to fit to the common Name of the provisiong cetificate which shall be used for the validation.

emaid.description: EMAID of the contract which need to fit to the common Name of the contract certificate itself

cpsRootCertificateId.description: The UUID of the desired V2G root CA which shall be used to sign these data with the regarding CPS signing certificate. Its optional. If not given, the CPS will decide which CPS signing V2G PKI will be used

CreateSignedContractDataResponse.title: Signed Contract Data (V1)
CreateSignedContractDataResponse.description:
Object containing the signed contract data which got sigend from the CPS

Deprecated: Use SignedContractDataResponse

signedData.description: Format of certificationInstallationRes as defined in ISO 15118-2:2014 in XML encoded in Base64.

cpsRootCertificateId.description: The UUID of the root CA which was used to sign this contract data (regarding CPS signing certificate)

cpsRootDistinguishedName.description: Reflects the subjects distinguished name of the used V2G Root PKI. (informative)
cpsRootDistinguishedName.example: "CN=V2G Root CA QA G1, DC=V2G, O=Hubject GmbH, C=DE"

contractBegins.description: Timestamp the contract will begin at.
contractBegins.x-constraint-message: The contractBegins does not match the specification

contractEnds.description: Timestamp until the contract is active.
contractEnds.x-constraint-message: The contractEnds does not match the specification

xsdMsgDefNamespace.description: ISO Version which shall be used for the signature

subscriptionUrl.description: URL which could be given bei MO to allow extended information exchange for a given contract

cpsRootCertificateId.description: The UUID of the desired root CA which shall be used to sign these data with the regarding CPS signing certificate. Its optional. If not given, the CPS will decide which CPS signing PKI will be used

example-1.cpsRootDistinguishedName: CN=V2G Root CA QA G1, DC=V2G, O=Hubject GmbH, C=DE

cpsDistinguishedName.description: Reflects the cps certificate distinguished name field. (informative)

cpsCertificate.description: Certificate Provisioning Certificate (CPS) in base64 encoded DER form

validFrom.description: Reflects the subjects not before date. (infotmative)

validTo.description: Reflects the subjects not after date. (infotmative)

organizationName.description: Reflects the subjects organization name value. (informative)

cpsRootCertificateId.description: Id identifies the v2g root certificate registered in the Root Certificate Pool if available. If this field is not given, the CPS is a external CPS signer

cpsRootDistinguishedName.example: CN=V2G Root CA G2, DC=V2G, O=Hubject GmbH, C=DE
cpsRootDistinguishedName.description: Reflects the v2g root distinguished name field. (informative)

cpsSubCa1Certificate.description: Certificate Provisioning CA1 (CPS SUB CA1) in base64 encoded DER form

cpsSubCa2Certificate.description: Certificate Provisioning CA1 (CPS SUB CA2) in base64 encoded DER form. Is optional

cpsCertificates.cpsRootDistinguishedName: CN=V2G Root CA QA G1, DC=V2G, O=Hubject GmbH, C=DE

cpsRootCertificateId.description: The UUID of the desired root CA which shall be used to sign these data with the regarding CPS signing certificate. Its optional. If not given, the CPS will decide which CPS signing PKI will be used

pcid.description: PCID of the Provisioning certificate, if null - no pcid was provided

signedData.description: Format of certificationInstallationRes as defined in ISO 15118-2:2014 in XML encoded in Base64.

cpsRootCertificateId.description: Id identifies the v2g root certificate registered in the Root Certificate Pool if available. If this field is not given, the CPS is a external CPS signer

cpsRootDistinguishedName.example: CN=V2G Root CA G2, DC=V2G, O=Hubject GmbH, C=DE
cpsRootDistinguishedName.description: Reflects the v2g root distinguished name field. (informative)

ContractData.description: Contract Data consisting of the contract certificate and its chain not including the MO Root CA itself. Furthermore the encrypted contract private key and the DH Public Key as descirbed in the ISO 15118 is included
ContractData.title: Contract Data

contractCertificate.description: Contract Certificate in base64 encoded DER form

contractSubCa2Certificate.description: Contract Certificate SUB CA 2 in base64 encoded DER form

contractSubCa1Certificate.description: Contract Certificate SUB CA 1 in base64 encoded DER form

dHpublickey.description: DH Public Key as defined in the ISO15118
